titleStmt.title: Ode upon the death of Mr. Cowley
titleStmt.author: Higgons, Thomas, Sir, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Herringman, at the Blew Anchor in the Lower-walk of the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: In verse: "He who would worthily adorn his herse,".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Blew Anchor in the Lower-walk of the New Exchange
